title: Friends list sorting
body:
I always preferred sorting my friends list alphabetically because that made more logical sense to me when I read through my list. Also, I like to have my offline friends visible on the list so I know that they are not online by actually seeing that they are not online rather than not finding their names on the 'online friends list'. 

The old client when I selected these options, sorting alphabetically and un-hiding offline friends, would give me first a list of online friends in order of their alphabet from A to Z THEN have the list of offline friends after that from A to Z. However, the new client just lists all the players from A to Z then greys out the offline ones and coloring the online ones. 

The old way was much more user friendly and easily readable. I wish Riot will consider this and either give us an option to use the old client style or simply roll it back to how it used to be.
